page.title: 13PEOPLE'S JOBS 2
page.content: Mr Dave B works at H.M.P .He has worked there for 13 years. he starts work at 6 Â£O'clock am and I finish at 3Â£O'clock is a section leader I have to get things for the day workers (females) my work is mainly boring and repetitive. Mr Anthony B works at Highpoint Prison.Wears a uniform.In charge of a wing of the prison and 115 prisoners.Is a Senior Officer.Can get enjoyment from the job but it is difficult because you keep people in prison against their will.The worst part of the job is counting prisoners in the morning because it stinks.
